Package org.apache.rat.mp

Class RatReportMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.apache.rat.mp.AbstractRatMojo
org.apache.rat.mp.RatReportMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReport
@Mojo(name="rat", requiresDependencyResolution=TEST, threadSafe=true) public class RatReportMojo extends AbstractRatMojo implements org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReport
Generates a report with Rat's output.
